english.segment1: River flow from Your throne. From Your heart through my soul. Healing flood God of peace. Speak Your word and quiet me
english.segment2: I was made to be loved by You. To be loved by You to be loved by You. I was made to be loved by You. To be loved by You to be loved by You (Jesus)
english.segment3: Mercy rain fall on me. Hide me now beneath Your wings. Hold me close to Your side. For I am Yours and You are mine
english.segment4: Open up wide Your arms and my eyes. Take all I have and make it Yours. You've given Your life and now I'm alive. To worship you now forevermore
english.segment5: I was made to be loved by You. To be loved by You to be loved by You Jesus. I was made to be loved by You. To be loved by You to be loved by You Jesus. I was made to be loved by You. To be loved by You to be loved by You oh
